title: Election 2012 exit polls : percentage of votes by ethnicity
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Black had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Barack Obama. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Race Black for Mitt Romney.
In Race Black, Barack Obama had the maximum Percentage of votes and it saw the lowest in Race White out of all 4 Races.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Barack Obama that was found in Race Black was 2.38 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Race White.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Black, Barack Obama had the highest Percentage of votes 93.0 among the 2 groups and in Black, Mitt Romney had the lowest Percentage of votes 6.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Black had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Barack Obama. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Race Black for Mitt Romney.
In Race Black, Barack Obama had the maximum Percentage of votes and it saw the lowest in Race White out of all 4 Races.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Barack Obama that was found in Race Black was 2.38 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Race White.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
Race Black had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Barack Obama. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Race Black for Mitt Romney.
Among all the Races, Barack Obama had the highest Percentage of votes in Race Black and lowest Percentage of votes in Race White.
There is a gap of 54.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Barack Obama in Race Black and White.
Among all 2 groups, Barack Obama had the gap of 54.0 between the maximum and minimum Percentage of votes observed in Race Black and White respectively.
On average, the Race Asian had the highest Percentage of votes for all 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney. Whereas White had the lowest average Percentage of votes.
